type.description: Presence type. `available` is automatically reset to `unavailable` after 60s. `composing` and `recording` are automatically held for ~25s by WhatsApp. `paused` can be used to reset `composing` and `recording` early.

patch.description: Edits a previously sent message. Only text messages (including captions) can be edited. The message must have been sent by you and must be within the editable time window (approximately 15 minutes).

subjectOwner.description: JID of the user who set the subject

subjectOwnerPn.description: Phone number JID of the subject owner

size.description: Number of participants in the group

creation.description: Timestamp when the group was created

ownerPn.description: Phone number JID of the group owner

owner_country_code.description: Country code of the group owner

descOwner.description: JID of the user who set the description

restrict.description: Whether only admins can change group settings

announce.description: Whether only admins can send messages

isCommunity.description: Whether the group is a community

isCommunityAnnounce.description: Whether the group is a community announcement group

joinApprovalMode.description: Whether join requests require admin approval

memberAddMode.description: Whether members can add other members

ephemeralDuration.description: Duration in seconds for disappearing messages
